com.facebook.litho.widget

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.ComponentLifecycle
      • com.facebook.litho.widget.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher

    public final class Text
extends ComponentLifecycle
    Component to render text.

    • Required Props

        • text

          Text to display.
          Type:
          java.lang.CharSequence

    • Optional Props

        • ellipsize

          If set, specifies the position of the text to be ellipsized.
          Type:
          android.text.TextUtils.TruncateAt

        • shouldIncludeFontPadding

          If set, uses extra padding for ascenders and descenders.
          Type:
          boolean

        • minLines

          Minimum number of lines to show.
          Type:
          int

        • maxLines

          Maximum number of lines to show.
          Type:
          int

        • minEms

          Makes the text to be mim ems wide.
          Type:
          int

        • maxEms

          Makes the text to be max ems wide.
          Type:
          int

        • minWidth

          Makes the text to be min pixels wide.
          Type:
          int

        • maxWidth

          Makes the text to be max pixels wide.
          Type:
          int

        • shadowRadius

          Blur radius of the shadow.
          Type:
          float

        • shadowDx

          Horizontal offset of the shadow.
          Type:
          float

        • shadowDy

          Vertical offset of the shadow.
          Type:
          float

        • shadowColor

          Color for the shadow underneath the text.
          Type:
          int

        • isSingleLine

          If set, makes the text to be rendered in a single line.
          Type:
          boolean

        • textColor

          Color of the text.
          Type:
          int

        • textColorStateList

          ColorStateList of the text.
          Type:
          android.content.res.ColorStateList

        • linkColor

          Color for links in the text.
          Type:
          int

        • textSize

          Size of the text.
          Type:
          int

        • extraSpacing

          Extra spacing between the lines of text.
          Type:
          float

        • spacingMultiplier

          Extra spacing between the lines of text, as a multiplier.
          Type:
          float

        • textStyle

          Style (bold, italic, bolditalic) for the text.
          Type:
          int

        • typeface

          Typeface for the text.
          Type:
          android.graphics.Typeface

        • textAlignment

          Alignment of the text within its container.
          Type:
          android.text.Layout.Alignment

        • glyphWarming

          If set, pre-renders the text to an off-screen Canvas to boost performance.
          Type:
          boolean

        • textDirection

          Heuristic to use to determine the direction of the text.
          Type:
          android.support.v4.text.TextDirectionHeuristicCompat

        • verticalGravity

          Vertical gravity for the text within its container.
          Type:
          com.facebook.litho.widget.VerticalGravity

        • highlightColor

          Type:
          int

        • textOffsetOnTouchHandler

          Type:
          com.facebook.litho.EventHandler

        • highlightStartOffset

          Type:
          int

        • highlightEndOffset

          Type:
          int

        • accessibleClickableSpans

          Type:
          boolean
